Acknowledgments
===================

SAMMI was developed using a number of JavaScript packages we would like to acknowledge. These are:

- `D3js <https://d3js.org/>`_.
- `jQuery <https://code.jquery.com/>`_.
- `jQuery UI <https://jqueryui.com/dialog/>`_.
- `Tippy <https://atomiks.github.io/tippyjs/>`_.
- `jscolor <http://jscolor.com/>`_.
- `jsPDF <https://parall.ax/products/jspdf>`_.
- `svg2pdf <https://github.com/yWorks/svg2pdf.js/tree/master>`_.
